app_descript:
StudentVUE

Brief: StudentVUE is a dynamic mobile application tailored for students to access their academic information easily. This free app mirrors the capabilities of the StudentVUE web portal, offering a seamless experience across Android devices. By ensuring students remain informed about their school progress, StudentVUE promotes a connected and proactive educational environment.
